room_title: Escape room "Escape Thai Prison" by MindEscape in Philadelphia
room_description:
Your friend tried to smuggle illegal substances through the Bangkok International Airport. Little did you know, the Thailand authorities have a zero-tolerance policy for drug dealers! The whole group has been detained and put in holding to be transferred to prison. You’re looking at a long sentence behind bars…
With just an hour left before the transportation, a riot breaks out at the station and the all of the officers have their hands full. No one is watching you… This could be your last chance to escape!
